page.title: 09STRACHAN SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is just off the B976 road. It was built in 1876. The school is heated by an old boiler in the west classroom.The teacher puts coal on during the day. There are 10 boys and 11 girls.Seven more are starting in August.Some children come to school by taxi. There are two classrooms.We do not have a hall.We have to use the village hall for P.E. and go there by taxi. There are 2 teachers and some specialist teachers visit. We have to go outside to the canteen and sometimes we get wet.Our meals come in containers. We have 3 big old trees in our play ground.Beside it is the school house (1907) now bought by the recently retired headmaster.Our school is very old but we have a lot modern equipment.
